text: ohu siyallama aapasu mawetha ewannata tharam nirdaya wi thibini.

namuth pasuwa penigos aththe mema lamaya ganngawe pawi yana mudal nottu ekathukara ganimata uthsaha karamin siti bawayi.ostriyawe yam kenek mudal ahamben soyagena polisiyata bhara dunahoth ohuta ema mudal walin siyayata 5 – 10 ka ayithiyak nithyanukulawa himiweyi.namuth mema mudal wala ayithikaru wasaraka kalayakadi hamunowunahoth mudala siyalla mema lamayata bharadimata niyamitha bawa ostriyawa prakasha karayi.

rupalawanyagarayedi krim wargayak wisha wi miyagiya guruwariyage maranaya wasan kala bawata chodana labu yuwalagen samiyata apa labeyi migamuwa samuha - wimal kirthi thama muhunata rupawanya sathkarayak sidukara ganima sandaha migamuwe rupalawanyagarayak wetha giya tharuna guruwariyakage muhune galwu krim warga wisha wi aya miyagiya awasthawe aya palanda siti ran aabharana sorakam kota age sirura waththala palu pradeshayakata gena gos dama ema maranaya wasan kirimata thath kirime chodana matha rimand bharaye pasu wu "mayi salon" namathi rupalawanyagaraya himikariyata saha age samiyata apa ayadimin adhikaranaya hamuwe gonu kala apa ayadumpath wibhaga kala migamuwa mahadhikarana winisuru shiran gunarathna mahatha ema naduwe sakakaruwan wu yuwalagen samiya pamanak rupiyal 50,000 ka mudal apa saha rupiyal laksha 5 bagin wathkam apa dekak matha rimand bharayen mudaharimata niyoga kaleya.

lankawe chithrapati gana katha kaloth......eeka digata dawas gananawak katha karanna puluwan.....eeth lankawa thulama 95%k nirmanaya wu 5% ka thakshanaya pitaratin labu....itha dawantha nalu nili piriwarak dayaka karagath aba itha wegayen 2009 wasara thula janapriya wuna....abata paksha wipaksha matha beda oone tharam thiyenawa.....eeth kala nirmanayak lesa aba sarthakayi....eeka api awiwadayen piligatha yuthuyi..ehi ithihasamaya washayen waradi thiyenawa kiyala boho dena kiwuwath....eewa ekak wath niwaradiwama waradi kiyala apita oppu karanna ba.....mokada api kawuruwath ee kale indala aawe na.....

thaththage mala gedara una welawe idan aspas katayuthu karala ,sarasili katayuthu wala idan hama deyakma sarthaka karaganna udawu karapu jumar ayiya,muditha,dhanuka,amil,aasiri,hasitha,panchala,ripan,achchu,dulaj,rasmika,janitha,newinda mallila tikata godak sthuthiyi.dilipa ayiya,supuna,gayan ayiya karapu udaw mata amathaka na.ape pawule kolloma 5yi.the ekak wath alla ganna kellek nathi ape pawule haki ayurin ee katayuthu karapu yashodhara nangi,chilakshi nangi,mithuni nangitath mage sthuthiya.kollonta nayit gahathdi chatar karanna bayit una podi gala nathnam purnawath mata mathakayi malaya.ashen (sudu bebi)mama umbaa gana wenama katha karanna oona.umbaa hitiye mage pitipassemayi.thamange katayuthu athapasu karagena dura katharak gewagena aapu hewage,lahiru malaya,chamin,ransiri umbaala okkotama thaks macho.mala gedara wechcha welawe idan mage oluwa hadanna kol karakara mage duka sapa hoya balapu thangalle mekhala nangitath,malesiyawe inna mage mithura jaye umbaalata enna puluwan unanam umbaala enawa kiyala mama dannawa.ra eliwenakan karam bord eka wate nidi warapu punchi siyam malli ube fit ekata me ayiya oluwa nawanawa.thawa kama mese bath kola danna udaw karapu githa akkage duwala dennatath,sayuri nanga athulu punchi yaluwo tikatath sthuthiyi.ane mata udawu karapu aya godak hitiya......ee hamotamath godak pin.umbaala wada kare mage thaththge mala gedara newi umbaalage thaththa maruna wage....aththatama umbaala okkoma mata hayiyak.................
